name: Margherita Pizza
desc: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
desc: A favorite with pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese, and tomato sauce.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
desc: Loaded with assorted veggies like bell peppers, onions, olives, and mushrooms.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
desc: Topped with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, onions, and cilantro.

name: Supreme Pizza
desc: A combination of pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and olives.

name: Hawaiian Pizza
desc: Featuring pineapple, ham, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Mushroom Pizza
desc: Loaded with mushrooms and mozzarella cheese.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
desc: For the meat enthusiasts with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.

name: White Pizza
desc: A pizza without tomato sauce, featuring garlic, ricotta cheese, and spinach.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
desc: Featuring a blend of mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, and parmesan cheeses.

name: Veggie Delight Pizza
desc: Packed with all the veggie goodness including bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and olives.

name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
desc: Featuring spicy buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Spinach and Feta Pizza
desc: A vegetarian option with spinach, feta cheese, and garlic.

name: Pesto Pizza
desc: Featuring basil pesto sauce, tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese.

name: Sausage and Mushroom Pizza
desc: A hearty combination of sausage, mushrooms, and mozzarella cheese.
